author: Samantha Netkin
title: Celine Dion Looks Like She Stepped Right Out of the Emerald City at the Grammys
text:
Celine Dion's Zuhair Murad Dress at the 2017 Grammys Celine Dion Looks Like She Stepped Right Out of the Emerald City at the Grammys February 12, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Celine Dion Looks Like She Stepped Right Out of the Emerald City at the Grammys 
Is there anyone (or anything, really) more timeless than Celine Dion? The powerhouse singer made an appearance at the 2017 Grammy Awards in a dress as breathtaking as her vocals. Her emerald Zuhair Murad Couture gown came adorned with sequins, an embellished bow, and structured shoulder pads. She accessorized with jewels and heels in the same hue. Needless to say, we'll be continuing to take queues from Celine's iconic style for years to come. Keep scrolling to zoom in on her red carpet look.
